summary: This is just a small mod that changes the coin to show the Nerd Herd logos.
descriptionHtml:
This is just a small mod that changes the coin to show the Nerd Herd logos.  Made it for friends of mine.

Images will be uploaded at a later time.

PS: The photoshopping I do is terrible, so don\'t expect much.
PSS: I just made this for fun, don\'t take it seriously

Download this and extract to
C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
author: Rich
